sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react' export const EditField = ( { user } ) => { const name = user[Object.keys(user)[1]] const password = user[Object.keys(user)[2]] const wardNumber = user[Object.keys(user)[3]] const gender = user[Object.keys(user)[4]] const diagnoses = user[Object.keys(user)[5]] const treatment = user[Object.keys(user)[6]] var inputValueRef = useRef(name); const [form,setForm] = useState({ fullName: '' , password: '', wardNumber: '', gender: '', diagnoses: '', treatment: '' }) const changeHandler = event => { setForm({...form,[event.target.name]: event.target.value}) } return (
) }
